docs.snippet: The Washington Redskins signed Jerry Rice Jr., son of the Hall of Fame receiver Jerry Rice....

docs.snippet: Luis Suárez, who was suspended twice before for biting opponents, will miss the rest of the World Cup and the start of the English Premier League season....
docs.lead_paragraph: Luis Suárez, who was suspended twice before for biting opponents, will miss the rest of the World Cup and the start of the English Premier League season.
docs.abstract: Luis Suarez, enigmatic striker from Uruguay who has starred for Liverpool in England’s Premier League, is suspended for nine games and barred from all soccer-related activities for four months; FIFA’s disciplinary committee determined that he bit an opponent during Uruguay’s 1-0 World Cup victory over Italy.

headline.seo: World Cup 2014: Luis Suárez Suspended by FIFA for Latest Bite
headline.main: Uruguay Star Barred 9 Games and 4 Months in Biting Incident
headline.print_headline: Suárez Suspended for 4 Months for Biting

docs.snippet: The award of broadcast rights for Italy's Serie A football league to Sky Italia and Mediaset is clarifying valuations for the two rivals and may trigger merger activity in Europe's pay-TV market....

headline.print_headline: Italy Football Rights Award May Drive M&A in Europe's Pay-TV Market

docs.snippet: The winless World Cup showing by Asia's four teams is a wakeup call for the region, the head of AFC said on Friday, but the lacklustre showing has not deterred calls for extra places at the finals from his members....
docs.lead_paragraph: The winless World Cup showing by Asia's four teams is a wakeup call for the region, the head of AFC said on Friday, but the lacklustre showing has not deterred calls for extra places at the finals from his members.

headline.main: Early World Cup Exits a Lesson for Asia, Says AFC Head

docs.snippet: German first-division football club Borussia Dortmund is taking a 26.7 million euro (21.35 million pounds) capital injection from its shirt sponsor, chemicals maker Evonik, who will get a 9.06 percent stake in the club in return....

docs.snippet: Uruguay striker Luis Suarez, who has been kicked out of the World Cup for biting an opponent, needs treatment to overcome his disciplinary problems, FIFA Secretary General Jerome Valcke said on Friday....
